description:
Douglas was not kidding when he said he likes surprising people by doing the unexpected. When he told me he was interested in doing some fucking, I was pleasantly surprised.

And, once again he was shy and wide eyed, but this time he was with Jamie, who has a way of making anyone feel comfortable.

"Well my friend, you are about to pop another cherry today," I said to Jamie.

He laughed, and for a second I thought he didn't know what I meant.

"Wait me?" he replied with a big grin on his face. "Oh yeah... it’s his first time, this is one of my newbies here that I am going to take advantage of. Well... I guess he’s taking advantage of me."

And that was the truth — Douglas took full advantage of Jamie!
title: Douglas & Jamie
